name: typique
description: Bundler-agnostic, zero-runtime CSS-in-TS â€” powered by a TypeScript plugin
author: Aleksei Berezkin

scripts.build: npm run build@root && npm run build@bin && npm run build@plugin
scripts.build@root: tsc && mv index.js index.mjs && tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.clean: npm run clean@bin && npm run clean@root && npm run clean@plugin && npm run clean@log && npm run clean@output && npm run clean@per-file
scripts.clean@bin: rm -f bin/*.js && rm -f bin/*.mjs && rm -f bin/*.d.ts
scripts.clean@root: rm -f index.js && rm -f index.mjs && rm -f index.d.ts && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.test: npm run test@unit && npm run test@serverUnit && npm run test@server && npm run test@bin
